level.heading: Oath as fiduciary.
level.text: Whenever any corporation operating under this Code shall be appointed such trustee, personal representative, special administrator, receiver, assignee, guardian, or committee, as aforesaid, the president, vice-president, secretary, or treasurer of said company shall take the oath or affirmation required by law to be made by any trustee, personal representative, special administrator, receiver, assignee, guardian, or committee.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-72, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 26-1309.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: "Code" means An Act To establish a code of law for the District of Columbia, ch. 854, §§ 1 through 1642.
